html:
8.31.20  9:23 am   Bill im really struggling to find an original song to make, any tips?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

8.31.20  9:20 am   Opinion on chairs?

      people should stand on them more often. incredible missed opportunity to see the world from a higher vantage point, perform soliloquys,

8.31.20  8:57 am   what would you do if you were a flying cat

      take a lot of video footage

8.31.20  8:21 am   How do you sleep?

      try to get even more awake

8.31.20  8:17 am   what is the meaning of life

      flipping out

8.31.20  6:38 am   are you a crab or a man

      i don't even know anymore

8.31.20  4:07 am   how to get better at stuff

      i dare you to try to avoid this

8.31.20  3:33 am   in "your free to do whatever you want to" at the end, you show a page of he music written out and I was wondering why you start the song in G#- but then you go to Ab. Why did you spell it like that? was it a ease of reading kind of thing?

      just trying to keep the key signature under 6 flats/sharps. Ab minor has Cb and Fb. G# major has B sharp, E sharp, and F double sharp. I realize the intro doesn't even really use the minor, but i think when i wrote the intro i was probably planning to keep it all minor. but then the life happens and it went major

8.31.20  2:10 am   What made you want to be a musician just curious 

      i don't remember starting, but it's clearly a free and easy superpower. so that is why i would start, any given day, if i had not already started

8.31.20  1:41 am   i saw the post about whether the verse of (It's the First Day of School and I Think I) Might Quit was supposed to be felt in 3 or in 4, and i wanted to let you know that you  very successfully carried the message over to me that it's in 4.
but corollary to that, I wanted to know if you had any other tips on how to take a bit of a song that's in an ambiguous time signature like 12/8 and strongly convey to the audience that it's one way or the other,

     slam the countoff as clearly as you can

     cause I have an old song that I specifically meant to be in 6/4, but until it gets to the chorus and the bigger percussion comes in, a lot of people end up hearing it as four dotted quarter notes of 12/8

     you're gonna have to put something on the beat that you want

8.31.20  12:48 am   How do I be a person

      impossible. it can't be done

8.31.20  12:24 am   do I have free will?

      yes

8.31.20  12:00 am   Have you ever considered forming a band?

     yes

     Your talent is absolutely astounding!

      we'll see about that

8.31.20  12:00 am   how do you heal a hurt goat?

      it's gonna heal anyway no matter what

8.30.20  11:27 pm   Is college worth it?

      it depends how much you pay

8.30.20  11:19 pm   Opinions on gummy bears

      not gummy enough

8.30.20  11:15 pm   what is the meaning of life?

      could be you

8.30.20  11:09 pm   IM IN COLLEGE AND ITS SO HARD TO FIND TIME RECORD AND SHIT WITH ROOMATES  AROUND WHAT DO I DOOOOOOOOOOO

      you could maybe panic

8.30.20  11:00 pm   Do you enjoy making music?

      yes

8.30.20  10:49 pm   How far away are the stars? 

      about arms length or so

8.30.20  10:46 pm   are you a hunam?

      oh that would explain how complicated everything seems

8.30.20  10:15 pm   what is your favorite type of bread

      fucked up

8.30.20  10:06 pm   How to commit tax fraud?

      pay way more than you're supposed to

8.30.20  10:02 pm   Do you have any books that you enjoy?

      no

8.30.20  9:17 pm   Does time exists

      oh that would explain a lot

8.30.20  9:10 pm   is music

      oh that would explain a lot

8.30.20  8:38 pm   Do you think that the repetitive rhythms and beats in mainstream music have become a problem?

     no

     Because unlike your songs, which have multiple unique tunes in each of them, they use the same stuff throughout the duration of the song. For example, Say So by Doja Cat, Better Now by Post Malone, Yummy by Justin Beiber, and the majority of rap music. Thoughts?

     i think you are seeing things through a certain particular pair of spectacles

8.30.20  8:37 pm   What's your best method of beating procrastination?

      figure out what it's for

8.30.20  8:32 pm   Are turkeys, big chickens?

      no

8.30.20  8:32 pm   what if i told u that u are not real

      i would tell you you aren't. this is a game for 2

8.30.20  8:18 pm   what is god

      must be everything

8.30.20  7:51 pm   hi this isn't a question but your exploration of music sounds so natural and enthusiastic. i want to be an art educator and i hope someday i have a student like you

      they might quit the class at a young age. that's just what happens sometimes

8.30.20  7:35 pm   when trees feel lonely, do they know why?

      yes

8.30.20  7:21 pm   can you recall what was going through your mind as you wrote rabbit snakes?

      yes. just before starting it, it was 'ok, i'm even more desperate now to get the writing thing going. try starting with something EVEN WORSE' .... and then during the rest of the time writing, i probably would have been thinking 'wow i can't believe this is working. i am pleased'

8.30.20  6:53 pm   what do I do with the constant, endless fear of failure?

      succeed

8.30.20  6:50 pm   if u could get anything in the world regardless of how expensive it is or how rare it is what would it be

      a scriptable version of Logic

8.30.20  6:46 pm   Do you have depression?

      no

8.30.20  6:42 pm   can you walk me through the manufacturing process of a singular bean

      no

8.30.20  6:33 pm   What are cars made off

      scientists are trying to figure out

8.30.20  6:06 pm   How would life be without numbers

      pretty good

8.30.20  5:13 pm   where did the home go in la de da de day oh?

      that bit of information is not included in the song

8.30.20  5:12 pm   In a previous question you talked about how 3D animation was 'the only tool' in your toolbox. Does that mean the next video will be almost entirely 3D animated? If so, that's great!

      well, the thing about 3D is, you can also do 2D if you just put the camera in 1 place and set it to orthographic

8.30.20  5:11 pm   you should consider making these question/responses into a bill wurtz book. I would 100% keep this around to read through questions and answers, happy to help with such a project too :) -lt

      ah, that reminds me of the Top40 archive book i have that mysteriously ends in 2003

8.30.20  4:30 pm   why are you so mysterious

      possibly as a reflection of the wider world

8.30.20  4:16 pm   why are you so damn cool?

      i'm just trying to get by

8.30.20  4:08 pm   thoughts on adding a lot of extensions to chords

      doesn't seem to quite work that way as far as i can tell

8.30.20  3:32 pm   what will make you switch to linux as your main operating system for the computer? given you are moving towards open source software

     i would do it now but that would be pretty bad timing. will possibly do it in the next round

8.30.20  2:59 pm   how do i make a good video?

      impossible. it can't be done

8.30.20  2:37 pm   How do you do through the Coronavirus, and when is your next music video that everyone loves?

      pretty soon

8.30.20  2:27 pm   Should I start playing piano? 

      could come in handy
